sentences.en: ...the country's increasing reliance on foreign aid.
sentences.cn: …这个国家日益依赖外来援助。

sentences.en: A child has reliance on his or her mother.
He had purchased a painting in reliance upon the authentication of a well-regarded expert.
sentences.cn: 他买下了一幅经知名专家鉴定过的画。

sentences.en: In the absence of actual data no reliance can be placed on such figures.
sentences.cn: 在缺乏实际资料的情况下,这样的数据不可靠.

sentences.en: Independence does not mean shutting the door on the world , nor does self - reliance mean blind opposition to everything foreign.
sentences.cn: 独立自主不是闭关自守, 自力更生 不是盲目排外.

sentences.en: No reliance is to be placed on his word.
One must not go to extremes in applying the principle of self - reliance .
sentences.cn: 不要把 自力更生 绝对化.

sentences.en: Our policy should rest on the basis of self - reliance.
sentences.cn: 我们的方针要放在自力更生的基点上.

sentences.en: People learned self-reliance because they had to.
sentences.cn: 人们被迫学会了自力更生。

sentences.en: Reliance on sponsorship can have a malign effect on theatre groups.
sentences.cn: 对赞助的依赖会给剧团带来不良的影响。

sentences.en: the country’s heavy reliance on trade
sentences.cn: 该国对贸易的严重依赖

sentences.en: The Prime Minister called for more economic self-reliance.
sentences.cn: 首相呼吁加强经济上的自给自足。

sentences.en: There is little reliance to be placed on his promises.
They continue to preach their gospel of self - reliance .
sentences.cn: 他们继续倡导 自立 的信条.

sentences.en: This witness has committed perjury and no reliance can be placed on her evidence.
sentences.cn: 这名证人作了伪证，她的证词不可信。

sentences.en: We must lay stress on self reliance.
sentences.cn: 我们必须强调自立更生.

sentences.en: We must persist in taking the road of self reliance.
sentences.cn: 我们必须坚持自力更生的道路.

words.tran_cn: 信赖；信心；受信赖的人或物

phrases.tran_cn: 印度瑞来斯实业公司（又称信实工业公司）

trans.tran_cn: 依靠，依赖，信任，信赖，信心，所信赖的人或物
trans.tran_en: when someone or something is dependent on someone or something else
